questions.question: During the synthesis of aspirin, what is the byproduct?

explanations.a: Used as a reagent, not a byproduct.
explanations.b: Used as a catalyst in some processes.
explanations.c: Correct – formed when acetic anhydride reacts with salicylic acid.

explanations.a: Correct – this is the molecular formula of aspirin.
explanations.b: Incorrect – this is for benzoic acid.

questions.question: Aspirin is commercially synthesized using a two-step process known as ----------

explanations.a: Correct – this method is used to prepare salicylic acid, a precursor to aspirin.
explanations.b: No known reaction by this name.
explanations.c: Used for reducing ketones to alkanes.
explanations.d: Used for reduction of carbonyls, not related to aspirin.
